file_content.text: Admiration: It is a great pleasure to witness your skills firsthand, master.
"Master"?
Clarification: Master Beniko altered my programming before we secured your release.
I am to serve you with the same unexcelled loyalty with which I serve her; in fact, your survival is now my highest priority.
Not the easiest job.
I'm no more important than Lana or Koth. Don't prioritize me above them.
Don't put me above them.
If I'm your highest priority, does that mean you obey me above Lana or Koth?
I outrank everyone else? Good.
Caveat: I cannot accept any order from you that would directly endanger Masters Beniko or Vortena. Otherwise, I am at your full disposal!
Do I have the authority to modify that programming?
Contradiction: Yes, oddly enough, you do. Though I can't imagine why you might wish to.
Just curious. No need to change anything.
Agreed--don't change anything.
When it comes to my orders, you will remove all safeguards. You will obey me no matter what--and you won't tell anyone about this change.
[Alter HK to obey you at any cost.]
Reprioritization: I have altered my programming accordingly, master.
Approval: I am glad you feel that way, master.
Resumption: Shall we continue?
Concession: I will alter my prioritization as you request, master.
Gossip: You are just as selfless as I had been led to believe.
Gossip: I had not been led to expect such selflessness from you, master. I am impressed.
Flattery: The skills you have demonstrated thus far, coupled with the stories told by Master Beniko, suggest that you are quite adept at ensuring your own survival.
Escaping that prison was only my latest misadventure. You'll have your work cut out for you.
Escaping that prison was just my latest dust-up. You're going to have your work cut out for you.
Enthusiasm: I look forward to eliminating any opponent foolish enough to attempt your murder regardless!
